html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Winter's here, which means you've got plenty of time to cozy up with your favorite album, a new audiobook, or this week's episode of that podcast you've been enjoying lately. With a good pair of headphones, you can make that listening a bit more enjoyable, and Black Friday is a good time to see if the pair you've been eyeing might be on sale. And if that set is the AirPods Pro, you can nab it right now for $159 on Amazon, or $90 off the seldom deeply discounted Apple retail price.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

If you'd prefer an over-ear headphone, the excellent Sony WH-1000XM4 is down to $248 at Best Buy right now, saving you just over $100 on the wireless headset. In our review, we praised these Sony headphones for their excellent sound quality, top-notch comfort and best-in-class noise cancellation.

Finally, if you'd rather spend a little less cash, there are still plenty of great headphones to snag on sale today, and we've rounded up the best deals for every budget.

Shop the best Black Friday headphone deals

  • Jabra Elite 45h at Jabra for $59.99 (Save $40)
  • Samsung Galaxy Buds Plus at Amazon for $75.52 (Save $73.48)
  • Sony WH-CH710N at Best Buy for $78 (Save $121.99)
  • Jabra Elite Active 75t at Amazon for $99.99 (Save $80)
  • Sony WF-1000XM3 at Best Buy for $128 (Save $101.99)
  • Jabra Elite 85t True Wireless at Amazon for $149.99 (Save $80)
  • Apple AirPods Pro at Amazon for $159 (Save $90)
  • Bose QuietComfort Earbuds at Amazon for $199 (Save $80)
  • Sony WH-1000XM4 at Best Buy for $248 (Save $101.99)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.

This article originally appeared on Reviewed: Shop deeply discounted Black Friday headphone deals from Bose, Sony, Jabra and AirPods
